title: Greetings of the Universe - Novel Updates
tags: Aliens   Futuristic Setting   Oneshot   Outer Space
author: Hoshi Shin'Ichi   星 新一
description: Humans have colonized a large number of planets. At such a time a new planet is discovered which is quite similar to Earth and a spaceship is sent to colonize it. The planet is successfully colonized but the original inhabitants of the planet are somewhat strange...>
